entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Saint John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:23 p.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 1.4Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 2:00 AM ADT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: NNW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning in the evening then changing to freezing rain after midnight. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
